tool_input.commands:
LOAD "sales_data.csv"
TOSS category eq "discontinued"
DERIVE margin = revenue - cost
DERIVE margin_pct = margin / revenue
MERGE "region_targets.csv" region
DERIVE variance = revenue - target
TALLY region -> total_rev=sum(revenue), avg_margin_pct=avg(margin_pct), deals=count(region), total_variance=sum(variance)
RANK total_rev desc
KEEP total_variance gt 0
PICK region, total_rev, avg_margin_pct, deals, total_variance
SHOW

error:
ERROR at line 5: MERGE: requires a quoted path and ON keyword.

--- HINT from prior sessions ---
- MERGE requires quoted path and ON keyword: MERGE "file.csv" ON column_name. Without ON keyword, merge fails.
- MERGE syntax: MERGE "file.csv" on column_name. Joins external data on matching column.
- LOAD requires file paths in double quotes. Correct syntax: LOAD "sales_data.csv". The agent initially wrote LOAD sales_data.csv without quotes.

tool_input.commands:
LOAD "sales_data.csv"
TOSS category eq "discontinued"
DERIVE margin = revenue - cost
DERIVE margin_pct = margin / revenue
MERGE "region_targets.csv" on region
DERIVE variance = revenue - target
TALLY region -> total_rev=sum(revenue), avg_margin_pct=avg(margin_pct), deals=count(region), total_variance=sum(variance)
RANK total_rev desc
KEEP total_variance gt 0
PICK region, total_rev, avg_margin_pct, deals, total_variance
SHOW
